addr: 35 Winans Street EAST ORANGE, NEW JERSEY 07017
title: #BlackGirlMonologues
desc: A new and exciting stage play will make its debut performance at Cicely Tyson Performance Arts Theater that will feature 13 monologues by 13 very dynamic and intriguing black women.? When you join us for the stage performance of? ? # ? BlackGirlsMonologues  you will experience our brand of sisterhood. Through each monologue, we pave?roads unchartered, where we lay our troubles down on that stage and leave them there. This is a reality show, yes? but one that will maturely and respectfully express our opinions and beliefs in ways that don?t degrade or seek to tear #BlackWomen apart. ?This stage play is created to provide proof that there?s strength in numbers; 13 women. 13 monologues. 13 subjects. It is empowering, unifying, and freeing. #BlackGirlsMonologues ? POWERFUL, rich, sacred and uplifting ? Monologues that showcase what WE have experienced and overcome and of what we have yet to set free.'
